ussr.model
Class ControllerImpl

java.lang.Object
  ussr.model.ControllerImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
Controller
Direct Known Subclasses:
ActControllerImpl, ATRONController, MTRANController, OdinController, OdinSampleController2, WhiteController
public abstract class ControllerImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements Controller

Abstract class providing a default implementation of the Controller interface. The class maintain a reference to the module and provides a convenience "wait for an event to be signalled on the module" method.

Author:
ups

Constructor Detail

ControllerImpl

public ControllerImpl()
Method Detail

activate

public abstract void activate()
Description copied from interface: Controller
This method is called by the simulator in a separate thread, and should define the computations performed by the module. Activate will only be called once the hardware has been set up.

Specified by:
activate in interface Controller
See Also:
Controller.activate()

setModule

public void setModule(Module module)
Description copied from interface: Controller
This method is called by the simulator to provide the controller code with a reference to the module.

Specified by:
setModule in interface Controller
Parameters:
module - the hardware to associate with the controller
See Also:
Controller.setModule(ussr.model.Module)

getModule

public Module getModule()
Description copied from interface: Controller
Get the module associated with the controller

Specified by:
getModule in interface Controller
Returns:
the representation of the module hardware

ussrYield

public void ussrYield()
Yield the control to some other thread, or pause if the simulation is paused. Yielding is done by waiting for the simulator to take a physics step.
